Occupying a prized position in Ringwood East just steps from Eastwood Primary School, Tintern Grammar, Ringwood Secondary College, Ringwood East Train Station and Ringwood East Village; this freshly painted three-bedroom weatherboard home with flexible living areas combines elegant original spaces and character details with contemporary and functional living zones.

Three bedrooms comprise quality 100% wool carpet and are served by a stunning contemporary bathroom that enjoys a dual-sink vanity and a second toilet. Capturing views of the garden and trees through its box window that is framed by plantation shutters, the master bedroom provides peaceful respite at the end of a long day.
The central kitchen is a place of warmth and atmosphere and boasts plenty of storage space and overlooks the sprawling back garden. With a great connection to the outdoors, the sunroom opens out to a covered deck for easy indoor-outdoor entertaining, where the private yard incorporates a swing set and large workshop.
A formal dining area allows the flexibility of a second living area, studio or home office. Additional highlights include built-in wardrobes, ducted heating, air-conditioning, ceiling fans, rewired electrics and off-street parking. Within close proximity to Wombolano Reserve, Eastland and EastLink.

Occupying a peaceful no-through road position in a family focused estate, this immaculately presented home is comfortable and connected living at its best.

Featuring updated appliances including a built-in stainless steel gas cooktop, rangehood, wall-mounted oven and dishwasher, plus a double pantry and breakfast bar, the kitchen forms the centrepiece of this impressive floorplan.

The bright central bathroom is a place to retreat, relax and rejuvenate, featuring a separate shower, vanity, heat light and warming corner spa bath.
Step outside to a serene backyard where a covered outdoor entertaining area overlooks a shimmering in-ground swim/spa, plenty of grassed space and plenty of secure off-street parking for the cars, boat, caravan or trailer.
Gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, storage sheds, a water tank and a double lock-up garage with both internal and rear access are bonuses in a fantastic opportunity in a sought after estate.
Surrounded by a number of picturesque parklands, close to Colchester Park Pre-school and Bayswater North Primary School, with easy access to Canterbury Gardens Shopping Centre, Canterbury Road, Colchester Road, Dorset Road, the Mountain Highway and Eastlink, this is an incredible opportunity for a stress-free family lifestyle.
